page.title: 03LOCAL HOUSING DEVELOPMENT
page.content: DRUMAHOE IS ABOUT THREE MILES FROM LONDONDERRY.A LOCAL SONG DECLARES THAT IT IS "JUST THREE MILES FROM DERRY TO THE BRIDGE AT DRUMAHOE"BESIDE THIS BRIDGE IS A BAR CALLED THE{THREE MILE {HOUSE."}THE RIVER FAUGHAN FLOWS THROUGH DRUMAHOE AND IT IS BESIDE THIS RIVER THAT HOUSING HAS DEVELOPED. THE VILLAGE HAS GROWN ENORMOUSLY OVER THE YEARS. AT FIRST THE HOUSING WAS SMALL RURAL COTTAGES SOME OF WHICH STILL REMAIN, FOR EXAMPLE FINCAIRN COTTAGES; THERE WERE ALSO LARGE HOUSES OF ESTATE OWNERS AND MILL OWNERS WHICH REMAIN. A SMALL RURAL HOUSING ESTATE WAS THEN BUILT. OVER THE PAST 10 YEARS THE VILLAGE HAS GROWN ENORMOUSLY. NEW PUBLIC HOUSING ESTATES HAVE BEEN BUILT. PRIVATE HOUSING ESTATES HAVE BEEN BUILT AND DRUMAHOE IS NOW ONE OF THE GROWING SUBURBS OF LONDONDERRY.
